level.heading: Warrants upon vouchers.
level.text: ยง 6-107 Warrants upon vouchers. a. All warrants upon vouchers for payment of amounts due under contracts, duly audited and approved, shall refer by number or other description to the voucher, the fund and the contract upon which the payment is to be made. All checks issued by the commissioner of finance on warrants duly approved and executed pursuant to law, as payments on contracts, may be mailed or delivered to the contractor or the contractor's authorized representative. b. The indorsement by the contractor upon a check attached to such a warrant, which has been paid by the bank or depository upon which the same has been drawn, shall be considered as a receipt for the amount of such check.
